name: Red Pepper Jelly-glazed Chicken Strips
description: This great low-sodium recipe is jam-packed with flavour!
preparation: Season both sides of chicken with Black Pepper. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and bake for approximately 25 minutes.
Heat frying pan over medium-low heat. Melt together margarine and Red Pepper Jelly. Stir in lemon juice.
Brush glaze over chicken and place under broiler for 2-3 minutes. Turn over, apply remaining glaze and broil until crisp and pleasantly browned.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
